lintParagraph

<Heading

>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"paragraph":{"type":"string","maxLength":4096,"example":"This is a sample text.","description":"The paragraph text to be checked"},"style":{"type":"string","example":"academic","description":"The writing style to check against"},"level":{"type":"string","enum":["low","medium","high"],"example":"medium","description":"The level of linting strictness"}},"required":["paragraph","style","level"],"title":"LintRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Lint results","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"original_paragraph":{"type":"string","description":"The original paragraph"},"corrections":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"start_pos":{"type":"number","example":0,"description":"Start position of the error"},"end_pos":{"type":"number","example":4,"description":"End position of the error"},"original_text":{"type":"string","example":"This","description":"The original text with the error"},"corrected_text":{"type":"string","example":"This","description":"The suggested correction"},"error_type":{"type":"string","example":"grammar","description":"Type of error"},"recommendation":{"type":"string","example":"Consider...","description":"Explanation of the correction"}},"required":["start_pos","end_pos","original_text","corrected_text","error_type","recommendation"],"title":"Correction"},"description":"List of corrections"},"style_recommendations":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"suggestion":{"type":"string","example":"Use active voice","description":"Style suggestion"},"reason":{"type":"string","example":"Active voice is more engaging","description":"Reason for the suggestion"}},"required":["suggestion","reason"],"title":"StyleRecommendation"},"description":"List of style recommendations"},"source":{"type":"string","enum":["openai","languagetool"],"example":"openai","description":"The linting service source"}},"required":["original_paragraph","corrections","style_recommendations","source"],"title":"LintResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"An error occurred","description":"Error message"}},"required":["error"],"title":"LintError"}}}},"401":{"description":"Not authenticated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"An error occurred","description":"Error message"}},"required":["error"],"title":"LintError"}}}},"503":{"description":"AI linting service unavailable","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","example":"An error occurred","description":"Error message"}},"required":["error"],"title":"LintError"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
